title: Wrong password/Username bug in client
body: I had an issue before where I couldn't enter a game because of constant bug splats but resolved that by reopening the client a few times. Got it again just before and it said it switched to an older version of the client and now it wont let me log in. I know i'm using the right password as I used it to log into this but it keeps saying incorrect username or password. I've clicked the link to reset my password 3 times and it still hasn't sent and i'm putting my team at a disadvantage now. Is there any way of resolving this or should I just delete and redownload?

replies.body:
I would definitely run a clean reinstall with the Hextech Repair Tool: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool Especially so if you've copied or moved your install at some point. 

If that doesn't work submit a ticket to Player Support and they should be able to help you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
